QuestData.Title: Of Dark Deeds and Dark Days
QuestData.Description: I should have known better, and now Rezan is dead, and my own power is barely holding on. Soon Bwonsamdi himself will be coming to collect me.$b$bTalanji... she must know what has happened here. Go to her, tell her. Aid her where you can.$b$bI followed a god of strength and yet I have not de strength to face her with dis shame.$B$bFor now, I must gather our forces and pursue Zul.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Princess Talanji in the Royal Chambers of Dazar'alor.
